title: Bug 8210Pull Up: Usage of editor selection is confusing
description: 1. Open junit.framework.TestCase2. make a selection 'setUp' inside of method 'runBare'3. From the edit menu, select 'Pull Up'As I see in the dialog that the acction was aplied to the code resolve ('setup'). I would have expected to take the element at the selection 'runBare'. The desription should mention the name of the method.
